SoundManager - Class in com.rattat.micro.game.frog.sound
Singleton class for playing Asteroids sounds Basically a wrapper around a SimplePlayer with hard-wired sound names Access with: SoundManager sound = SoundManager.getInstance(); sound.play(SoundManager.SOUND_MENU);

TYPE_DEADLY - Static variable in class com.rattat.micro.game.frog.board.elements.Channel
Deadly cell type - if the frog lands on this then the user looses a life
TYPE_MOVING - Static variable in class com.rattat.micro.game.frog.board.elements.Channel
Moving cell type - if frog lands on it then the frog gets moved along at the same speed as then channel.
TYPE_SAFE - Static variable in class com.rattat.micro.game.frog.board.elements.Channel
Safe cell type - frog can step on it and nothing happens
